item.title: Downbeat Data: The Bloomberg Close, Asia Edition
item.description: Asian stocks fell on Wednesday after data showed that China’s manufacturing activity slowed in June. The Caixin/Markit Manufacturing Purchasing Managers’ Index (PMI) fell to 50.4 in June from 51.1 in May. A reading below 50 indicates contraction, while a reading above 50 indicates expansion.
